name: All salts of Al, NH4, Ba, Ca, Co, Cu, Fe, Li, Mg, Mn, K, Na, Zn, Eu, Gd, La and Tb of Boric acid
SMLTrestrictions: G16 Group Restriction No. 21 corresponds to FCM substance No. 347,349. Group restriction specification is expressed as boron, without prejudice to the provisions of Directive 98/83/EC.
